thread.title: Here's the generous gesture from Cristiano Ronaldo that dog owners will love
thread.title_full: Here's the generous gesture from Cristiano Ronaldo that dog owners will love

author: Roger Gonzalez
title: Here's the generous gesture from Cristiano Ronaldo that dog owners will love
text:
Here's the generous gesture from Cristiano Ronaldo that dog owners will love Props to Ronaldo for this one 1h ago â€¢ 1 min read 
Cristiano Ronaldo has produced quite the gesture to help out a part of his home country. The Real Madrid superstar learned about the difficulties one dog kennel was having, and he came to the rescue. 
According to Portuguese publication Correio de Manha , Ronaldo helped a dog kennel that was dealing with financial difficulties , sending a signed Real Madrid jersey of his to auction off. The proceeds are to go to helping the facility with vet treatments, maintenance, utilities and more. 
Lilliana Santos of the kennel said she wanted to thank Ronaldo from the bottom of her heart. 
"It's a simple gesture, but very important," she said, according to the paper. 
Bravo, Ronaldo. For him, sending a signed jersey is simple. But the impact it can have is great, and here is an example of that gesture helping a place that houses 80 dogs.
